original_theorem: Let $(a_n)$ be a sequence of positive real numbers. If $\lim_{n 	o \infty}  rac{a_{n+1}}{a_n} = L$ where $0 < L < 1$, then $\lim_{n 	o \infty} a_n = 0$.
theorem_translation:
```lean4
theorem tendsto_zero_of_ratio_limit_lt_one (a : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (L : ‚Ñù)
  (ha_pos : ‚àÄ n, 0 < a n)
  (ha_ratio_tendsto : Tendsto (fun n ‚Ü¶ a (n + 1) / a n) atTop (ùìù L))
  (hL_pos : 0 < L)
  (hL_lt_one : L < 1) :
  Tendsto a atTop (ùìù 0) := by
```
